title: TASK_START_SCENARIO_IN_PLACE
content:
0x142A02425FF02BD90xE50D6DDE// TaskStartScenarioInPlace
void TASK_START_SCENARIO_IN_PLACE(Ped ped, char* scenarioName, int timeToLeave, BOOL playIntroClip);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.scenarioName: The name of the scenario to start.timeToLeave: Sets the timeout on the scenario point to the specified time in milliseconds. If less than 0, sets the IdleForever flag.playIntroClip: If the ped should play the scenarios enter animation. Sets the SkipEnterClip flag.Puts the ped into the given scenario immediately at their current location. List of scenario names or in update/update.rpf/common/data/ai/scenarios.meta.
codeBlocks:
// TaskStartScenarioInPlace
void TASK_START_SCENARIO_IN_PLACE(Ped ped, char* scenarioName, int timeToLeave, BOOL playIntroClip);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for TASK_START_SCENARIO_IN_PLACE
TaskStartScenarioInPlace(ped, '', 0, false)
